explanation: UIDAI issues Aadhaar - 12 digit unique identity. Government body.
Aadhaar is 12-digit unique ID. Links to biometrics (fingerprint, iris).

answers: Carry Aadhaar on phone - valid as proof
explanation: mAadhaar stores Aadhaar on phone. Valid as identity proof. QR code for verification.
DigiLocker stores documents (license, certificates) in cloud. Linked to Aadhaar.

answers: Legally valid digital signature using Aadhaar
explanation: e-Sign provides legally valid digital signature. Uses Aadhaar OTP for authentication.

answers: Multiple government services in one app
explanation: UMANG - over 1700 government services. Central, state, local in one app.
GeM is government e-marketplace for procurement. Transparent purchasing.
e-Tendering allows online submission of bids. Faster, transparent.
incometax.gov.in is the official e-filing portal. inc.in also used.
Passport Seva Kendras and online portal for passport services.
IRCTC - Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation. Books rail tickets.
Co-WIN is platform for COVID-19 vaccination registration and certificates.
ABDM creates Health ID, digitizes health records. Part of National Digital Health Mission.

answers: Public Wi-Fi networks - WiFi Access Network Interface
explanation: PM-WANI enables public Wi-Fi through interoperable model. Boosts connectivity.

prompt: Digital infrastructure under Digital India includes?
explanation: Digital India has three pillars: infrastructure, governance, digital empowerment.

answers: Government and other services in rural areas
explanation: CSCs are access points for digital services in rural and remote areas.
MyGov allows citizens to participate in policy, give ideas, discussions.
DIKSHA - Digital Infrastructure for Knowledge Sharing. School education content.

answers: Free online courses from school to higher education
explanation: SWAYAM - free MOOCs. Courses from school to postgraduate. Government initiative.

prompt: National Scholarship Portal NSP is for?
explanation: NSP is single window for various government scholarship schemes.

answers: Using ICT for government services and delivery
explanation: e-Governance uses technology to deliver government services efficiently.
NeGD under MeitY implements e-Governance projects. Supports Digital India.
NPCI is promoted by RBI and banks. Operates UPI, RuPay, IMPS, etc.

answers: Send receive money using VPA or mobile
explanation: BHIM/UPI enables instant money transfer using VPA (name@bank) or mobile number.
VPA is like email for payments - name@bank. No need to share account number.
